meanings.definition: A dress that resembles a coat in style and length.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish coatdress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The coatdress she wore to the event was elegant and sophisticated.
meanings.sent3: Her coatdress was so long, it almost looked like a fancy robe!
meanings.sent4: The coatdress wrapped around her like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The coatdress flowed gracefully as she walked down the runway.
